#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n;
    char s[10];
    while(scanf("%d",&n))
    {
         
     if(n==1)
     {cout<<1<<"\n";
     continue;}  
     if(n==2)
     {cout<<5<<"\n";
     continue;}   
     if(n==3)
     {cout<<4<<"\n";
     continue;}   
     if(n==4)
     {cout<<0<<"\n";
     continue;}                     
     int sum=0;
     for(int i=n;i>4;i--)
     {
     int p=i%10;
   double m=(pow(p,4));
     
     int q=(int)m;
    // cout<<q<<" ";
     int r=q%10;
  //  cout<<r<<" ";
     sum+=r;
     }
     sum=sum%10;
     cout<<sum<<"\n";
     }
     return 0;
     }
